Message:
My reason was simple—
because Mom and Dad
hated them.

I wanted my parents to think
I was their good little girl,

so I said all sorts of bad things
about witches.

In the picture books
I used to read,

witches were depicted as
terrifying monsters that
had big horns and claws.

They disguised themselves as
normal humans and wrecked
havoc on people.

That’s why, even when
that girl saved me from
a rabid dog...
I was really cautious at first.

Because...I thought that since
she lived all by herself
in the forest,

she might have
actually been a witch.
